text:
W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION
250 CHAMPION STREET
BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN
DIVISION OF EDUCATION
MAURICE F. SEAY
DIRECTOR
June 25, 1959
PHONE WO S-8HS
Dr. Harry J. Skornia, Exec. Director /
Nat‘l. Ass’n. of Educational Broadcasters
l4 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Thanks for this letter of June 12th telling me of the dates
for the Washington Conference and for your annual convention
and enclosing copies of the new projects for which you have
received support. They are very interesting. I am putting
the Washington Conference and the annual convention on my
travel schedule. How terrible would it be if I attended only
the first two days of the Washington Conference? I may need
to be back in Battle Creek on the 11th.
Sincerely and with best wishes.
Maurice F. Seay
MFS/fh
